name: ListPullRequestCommentReactions
description:
Retrieve reactions for a pull request review comment.

Use this tool to list all reactions associated with a specific pull request review comment in a GitHub repository. It helps in understanding community engagement on specific comments.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: comment_unique_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the pull request review comment.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the comment.

parameters.name: filter_reaction_type
parameters.description: Specify a single reaction type to filter results. Leave blank to return all reactions.

value_schema.description: Returns a single [reaction type](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/reactions#reaction-types). Omit this parameter to list all reactions to a pull request review comment.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of reactions to return per page, up to a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: results_page_number
parameters.description: Specify the page number of results to fetch for reactions to a pull request review comment.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Returns a single [reaction type](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/reactions#reaction-types). Omit this parameter to list all reactions to a pull request review comment.

value_schema.description: Returns a single [reaction type](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/reactions#reaction-types). Omit this parameter to list all reactions to a pull request review comment.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the comment.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the comment.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
